actions.text: Amendment SA 860 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 860 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843. (consideration: CR S4559-4560, S4560-4562) To modify the requirements for the report on any clandestine prison or detention facility for individuals captured in the global war on terrorism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 860 proposed by Senator Rockefeller for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 843.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 860 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To modify the requirements for the report on any clandestine prison or detention facility for individuals captured in the global war on terrorism.
